title: Samsung Galaxy A23 and Galaxy A13 4G launched in India with a 50MP primary camera and 5,000mAh battery
content:
After launching the Galaxy A23 and Galaxy A13 4G in the US earlier this month, Samsung has finally brought its latest affordable smartphones to India. Both phones are now officially available in the country and compete directly against the budget-friendly offerings of Xiaomi and Realme in the budget segment. The Galaxy A23 is a follow-up

The post Samsung Galaxy A23 and Galaxy A13 4G launched in India with a 50MP primary camera and 5,000mAh battery appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A23 and Galaxy A13 4G in India. Check out the pricing, availability and specifications.
